roles.jobseekerDesc: Find your dream job and apply

forms.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

forms.passwordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

app.title: CareerHub
app.subtitle: Find your dream job or perfect candidate

legal.agreement: By registering, you agree to our

footer.tagline: Your AI-powered career companion. Transform your job search with intelligent tools and personalized guidance.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.headerDescription: We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring transparency about how we handle your data.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to CareerBoost. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we look after your personal data when you visit our platform and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
dataCollection.identityData: Identity Data: Name, username, date of birth, gender
dataCollection.contactData: Contact Data: Email address, telephone numbers, address
dataCollection.profileData: Profile Data: Username and password, interests, preferences
dataCollection.careerData: Career Data: Resume/CV, work experience, education, skills
dataCollection.technicalData: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, time zone settings

serviceDelivery.title: Service Delivery
serviceDelivery.description: To provide and maintain our career services, including job matching and CV analysis.

personalization.title: Personalization
personalization.description: To personalize your experience and provide relevant job recommendations.

communication.title: Communication
communication.description: To send important updates about your account and our services.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: To improve our platform and develop new features based on user behavior.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.intro: We do not sell your personal data. We may share your information with:
dataSharing.employersDesc: When you apply for jobs through our platform
dataSharing.serviceProvidersDesc: Companies that help us operate our platform
dataSharing.legalRequirementsDesc: When required by law or to protect our rights
dataSharing.businessTransfersDesc: In connection with any merger or acquisition

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We have implemented appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used, or accessed in an unauthorized way. We use encryption, secure servers, and regular security assessments to protect your information.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.accessDesc: Request copies of your personal data
yourRights.erasureDesc: Request deletion of your personal data
yourRights.objectionDesc: Object to processing of your personal data
yourRights.portabilityDesc: Request transfer of your data to another organization

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us:

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date.

onboarding.swipeHint: Swipe left/right or use buttons to navigate

steps.aiCVEnhancerDesc: Transform your resume with our intelligent CV analyzer. Get personalized suggestions to stand out to employers and pass ATS systems with flying colors.
steps.jobMatcherDesc: Discover perfect job opportunities tailored to your skills and aspirations. Our AI analyzes your CV to match you with ideal positions.
steps.aiInterviewDesc: Practice with our intelligent interview simulator. Get real-time feedback on your answers, communication style, and body language.
steps.careerCompanionDesc: Join a community of professionals and get personalized career guidance. Your success journey starts here.
steps.readyStartDesc: You're all set! Start your journey towards career excellence with our AI-powered tools and community support.

ios.title: Install the App
ios.description: To install this app on your iPhone/iPad:
ios.step1: Tap the Share button in Safari

android.title: Add to Home Screen
android.description: Install our app for the best experience and quick access from your home screen.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Oops! It looks like the page you're looking for has been moved, deleted, or doesn't exist.

dashboard.uploadCVDesc: Upload your current resume for AI analysis and enhancement
dashboard.aiAnalysisDesc: Get personalized suggestions to improve your CV
dashboard.findJobsDesc: Discover jobs that match your skills and preferences
dashboard.practiceInterviewDesc: Prepare for real interviews with our AI video platform
